title: Life here at Courtland Place is Uncomplicated...A 55+ Community
neighborhood: Bike, Bus or Walk EVERYWHERE | Rainier Valley | Seward Park
posting_body: We are conveniently located in a charming community nestled between Seattle's residential neighborhoods of the Rainier Valley, Columbia City and Seward Park.
We provide easy access to Downtown Seattle, Uwajimaya Market and an abundance of wonderful neighborhood parks.
Whether Driving, Biking or Busing, when choosing Courtland Place, you'll be combining Affordable Living with Convenience and Location.
"Live here you'd be HOME" !!!
~~ Inviting, Clean and Spacious | Fresh Paint | 'Sunshine Suite' from only $965.00
~~ Galley Style Kitchen with Café eating Area | Breakfast Bar
~~ Wonderful Natural Lighting in Home
~~ Washer / Dryer located on your floor
~~ Gracious Storage and Closet Space
~~ Spacious Bedrooms and Queen Master Suite
~~ Extra Storage and Street Parking Available
~~ Outdoor Community Patio with all New Furniture and BBQ
Our residents 'RAVE' about living at Courtland Place.
Call us today and learn how you can make our wonderful community HOME !!!
In person tours are now available.
Urban Living at it's best for 55+ Seniors !!
The Courtland Place Apartments | 3621 33rd
Ave S. |
